definition: to be stupid/to cheat or deceive/me or I (modest)

sentences.english: Touch of Idiocy no longer permits Heighten, as it has no save.
sentences.chinese: 愚鈍之觸將不禁升階了，因爲其無豁免。

sentences.english: The feeble-minded, like Loughner, are the first to sink.
sentences.chinese: 愚鈍如Loughner者，正是沉淪的第一位。

sentences.english: So what exactly is a Stupid Network?
sentences.chinese: 那麼究竟什麼是一個愚鈍網絡？

sentences.english: Edison, the inventor of light, was said to be stupid when he was young.
sentences.chinese: 電燈的發明者愛迪生在幼年時曾被認爲很愚鈍。

sentences.english: She seemed a bit obtuse, unfunny, yet wanted desperately to please me.
sentences.chinese: 她給人感覺有點愚鈍，乏味，但又竭力想取悅於我。

sentences.english: She answered me like the obtuse child she decided I was.
sentences.chinese: 她當即覺得我愚鈍不可教，但還是回答了我。

sentences.english: But in a world of smart terminals, networks have to be dumb.
sentences.chinese: 但在一個智能終端的世界裏，網絡必須要愚鈍。

sentences.english: Princes, the dregs of their dull race, who flow.
sentences.chinese: 公侯，愚鈍世系的殘渣們。

sentences.english: It must be to everybody , even to the dullest mind .
sentences.chinese: 這一定是每個人都明瞭的，即使是最愚鈍的人。

sentences.english: He is so unrefined as to be lacking in discrimination and sensibility.
sentences.chinese: 他是如此愚鈍，缺乏辨別力和敏感度。

sentences.english: They seem to glory in their reputation for crass commercialism.
sentences.chinese: 他們彷彿以他們的愚鈍的重商主義名聲爲自豪。

sentences.english: Internet Protocol points the way to a key property of Stupid Networks.
sentences.chinese: 互聯網協議是愚鈍網絡的關鍵屬性。

sentences.english: The Stupid Network is underspecified - this means bits-in, bits-out.
sentences.chinese: 愚鈍網絡是不指定的，比特進，比特出。

definition: to dabble and stop (idiom); to dip into/to attempt half-heartedly/content with a smattering of knowledge
to love ease and comfort and hate work (idiom)
to be content with what one is
lit. one body two sides (idiom)/fig. a situation with two sides to it
to be a tax on (one's mind)/to bother/to trouble/to be concerned
